### Tender Description

The Standards Council of Canada (SCC) is seeking a qualified organization or individual to develop a National Technical Specification (TS) on selection and deployment of emergency flood barriers for Canadian municipalities. The selected Bidder will be responsible for establishing and managing a technical committee, developing the TS, and creating a short public-facing graphical guide.

### Deliverables

*   A National Technical Specification (TS) on selection and deployment of emergency flood barriers for Canadian municipalities
*   A short public-facing graphical guide for selecting and deploying emergency flood barriers, outlining the key messages of the TS

### Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria

The SCC will select the successful Bidder based on the following criteria:

*   Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
